description: Though Daniel (Dirk Caber) has given in to the secrecy of his relationship with Jake (Nick Capra) time and again, he’s no longer willing to once he discovered Jake’s infidelity with his boss, Brian (Adam Killian). Daniel pays a visit to Tony (Dakota Payne), but instead of having a heart-to-heart talk with him about his stepfather, he winds up showing him the dynamics of their relationship by having bareback sex with the young stepson Tony!
series: Secrets My Daddy Never Told Me
title: TRAILER: Dirk Caber Barebacks Dakota Payne
